name: Construction
text:
PART I.  GENERAL PROVISIONS
 
     §84-1  Construction.  This chapter shall be liberally construed to promote high standards of ethical conduct in state government. [L 1972, c 163, pt of §1]
 
Law Journals and Reviews
 
  The Lawyer-Legislator and the Canons of Ethics.  1 HBJ, Jan 1959, at 11.
